thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of transferwise.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I made two moderately large transfers, one to myself and one to a friend. I know that my friend received his euros exactly as promised but my own transfer cannot be verified until I travel to Spain in a couple of weeks time.
I am new to the use of computers and utterly technophobic but even I found the process easy.
In the past I have used Nationwide via my debit card, but although the rate given by them is as good as Transferwise the Spanish bank charges 3% making it expensive. I WILL use Transferwise in the future.
